story.kicker_image_caption: Karan Patel and Ankita Bhargava are known for their PDA on Twitter. Picture courtesy: Twitter/Ankita Bhargava.
story.storykicker: Yeh Hai Mohabbatein star Karan Patel pampered his wife to no end on the first day of her shoot.
story.storybody:
Ankita Bhargava, who has appeared in shows like Kesar, K Street Pali Hill and Kasautii Zindagi Kay, is making a comeback on TV after a long time. The actress has bagged a Doordarshan show titled Vidya for which she was in talks for over a year.

Ankita started shooting for the soap yesterday, and hubby Karan Patel, who plays Raman Bhalla in popular show Yeh Hai Mohabbatein, pampered his wifey to no end. Ankita took to Twitter to thank Karan and he in turn responded with a sher.

Check out:

1st day of shoot and so much pampering happnd ! ??@TheKaranPatel I love u like i have never loved before ??
I??U pic.twitter.com/CRIkicfcPZ

�?? Ankita Bhargava (@AnkzBhargava) June 2, 2016

Ibtada-e-ishq hai rota hai kya,
Aage aage dekhiye hota hai kya ..!! https://t.co/Txjj67Jptu

�?? Karan Patel (@TheKaranPatel) June 2, 2016

And this is how Ankita replied:

Ishq hi ek aisa rang hai jo jitna dheere chadhhe utna hi gehra rachè !
Aap bhi dekhiye aage aage hota hai kya ?? https://t.co/uY6CNm8Mjd

�?? Ankita Bhargava (@AnkzBhargava) June 3, 2016
We are in love with this telly couple. Are you?
